participant_1.background:
I am a writer that is also sensitive to people's reactions to my work.
i d like to be a teacher in the future.
My studies are my top priority.
i have thrown up every day for the last 3 months with morning sickness.
I got to know my girlfriend better in the past year.

participant_2.background:
I do not wish to disclose my marital status.
i like football.
I can't do gymnastics if I were blind because I need to see my surroundings and the equipment to be able to do them safely.
I like to spend my days trying new things and exploring new places, especially with friends who encourage me to push my boundaries.
my favorite subject in school was science.

content.text: Hi how are you doing today?
I am doing great thanks for asking! How about yourself?
I am doing well! I am excited to finally be finished with my studies, and now I can start working on my career as a writer.
That's great! What kind of things do you like to write about?
I write a lot of short stories, but I also enjoy writing poetry. I am always trying to find new ways to express myself creatively.
I love poetry! I used to write it all the time when I was younger. I haven't done it in a while though.
You should get back into it! It's a great way to relax and express yourself.
Maybe I will! I have been thinking about it lately.
I'm glad to hear that. I would love to read some of your work sometime if you're ever interested in sharing it.
Thanks for the offer! I will definitely keep that in mind.
Great! I hope you have a wonderful day!
